item.title: Brandon Harvey, Los Angeles, CA
item.description: meta :: supernatural As a Product Manager at Supernatural (a VR fitness app, now owned by Meta) (2022-present), I help Supernatural identify, adopt, and succeed with new technology opportunities as they appear up and down the stack. magnopus :: product engineering As a Director of Engineering for Product at Magnopus (2020-2022), I shaped the US side of the companyâ€™s first product team. Starting in the middle of the pandemic, I hired and internally recruited to assemble an effective new software delivery organization.
